4.2 Abhidhammabhājanīya
Saccavibhaṅga
Abhidhammabhājanīya
206.
767Cattāri saccāni—  dukkhaṃ, dukkhasamudayo, dukkhanirodho, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā.
768Tattha katamo dukkhasamudayo? Taṇhā—  ayaṃ vuccati “dukkhasamudayo”.
769Tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ? Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṃ—  idaṃ vuccati “dukkhaṃ”.
770Tattha katamo dukkhanirodho? Taṇhāya pahānaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “dukkhanirodho”.
771Tattha katamā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā? Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi…pe…  paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti sammādiṭṭhi…pe…  sammāsamādhi.
772Tattha katamā sammādiṭṭhi? Yā paññā pajānanā…pe…  amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammādiṭṭhi”.
773Tattha katamo sammāsaṅkappo? Yo takko vitakko…pe…  sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāsaṅkappo”.
774Tattha katamā sammāvācā? Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāvācā”.
775Tattha katamo sammākammanto? Yā tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammākammanto”.
776Tattha katamo sammāājīvo? Yā micchā ājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāājīvo”.
777Tattha katamo sammāvāyāmo? Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe…  sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāvāyāmo”.
778Tattha katamā sammāsati? Yā sati anussati…pe…  sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāsati”.
779Tattha katamo sammāsamādhi? Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti…pe…  sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “sammāsamādhi”. Ayaṃ vuccati “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”. Avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā.
207.

782Tattha katamo dukkhanirodho? Taṇhāya ca, avasesānañca kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “dukkhanirodho”.
783Tattha katamā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā? Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi…pe…  paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—  sammādiṭṭhi…pe…  sammāsamādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati—  “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”. Avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā.
